plants.name: ZZ Plant
plants.essential-2: Does best in room temp (60 - 70  F)
plants.essential-3: Grows best in bright filtered light
plants.essential-4: Allow solid to become dry to touch between watering days
plants.whatNotToDo-2: Does not do well in cold temp (45 F and below
plants.whatNotToDo-4: Avoid over watering! This plant does better with less water

plants.name: Bell Pepper
plants.essential-2: Peppers need a lot of sunlight in order in order to produce healthy fruit
plants.essential-3: Start your pepper seeds indoors 8 - 10 weeks before spring in order to prevent your plant from the winter frosty months
plants.essential-4: Needs 1 - 2 inches of water per week
plants.whatNotToDo-2: Do not keep your plant seedlings outside. Peppers seeds need warmth in order to germinate or grow properly
plants.whatNotToDo-3: Do not keep your pepper in the shade, it loves lots of sunlight
plants.whatNotToDo-4: Do not transplant your bell pepper until you are sure the frosty season is over. Bell peppers must be in tempuratures above 50 degrees F once outdoors
